content.question: Which of the following most directly resulted from the events described in the excerpt?

choices.label: United States peacekeeping missions in eastern Europe and Africa
United States launching wars in Afghanistan and Iraq
The mediation between Israel and Egypt by the United States
The end of the Cold War between the Soviet Union and the United States

content.answer: United States launching wars in Afghanistan and Iraq

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
